description:
The Space King Kittan, an Dai-Gunman piloted by King Kittan, was created by Leite later in the series.
But was destroyed in a failed attempt to save the Super Galaxy Dai-Gurren from the Anti-Spirals` Galactic Death Spiral by destroying its core. However, before exploding, the normal-sized King Kittan ejected and through Kittan awakening his Spiral Power and the usage of its own variant of Gurren Lagann`s Giga Drill Break attack, it achieved its mission before getting destroyed too along with its pilot.
name: Space King Kittan
